Description: Thank you for visiting our ebay store! About Products - Pocket watches under our private brand "Carrie Hughes" make superb birthday or Christmas gifts. - They are also ideal for corporate gifts or for anyone looking for cool things to buy. - Here is an example of a pocket watch in a vintage gothic design. - High quality mechanical wind up pocket watch. Technical specifications Product number: CHPW14 Display: Analogue Movement: Mechanical Hand-wind Case material: Metal Case (Length/Width/Height): 47 / 47 / 14 mm Band material: Metal Band (Length/Width): 375 / 5 mm Calendar function: no Water-Resistance (bar/ATM): no Product Dimensions: 5.9 x 2.9 x 0.6 inches Package included: Pocket watch with Chain* 1 - Carrie Hughes Gift box * 1 How use mechanical watch? -1. When you first wear, turn the pocket watch button (clockwise) until it is full (15-20 hands). -2. Gently pull up the button, turn the adjustment time, and then press the button. -3. If you are still standing for a long time, please gently swing several times, winding a few laps. At this point it will work properly. -4. If you feel the winding is tight, please immediately stop spinning, so as not to damage the movement.
